alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 3:38PM MDT until October 29 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO NOON MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to noon MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
